column5: anyone know of any places in and around cooks bay? a friend and i would like to go on saturday, havent fished up there in years and the one place i knew of that did rent (simcoe fishing adventures) no longer does.
thank you so much capt bruce.

here is what I know about, I have not checked in a couple of years but they should still be in business  http://simcoefishingadventures.com/?cat=22 Call 905-476-2652 or cell at 905-960-2652 For Rick (whitey)   Boat Rentals Cook's Bay 705-456-0000  harry's in Keswick does/did but you don't hear many positive reports about his boats
I'd second Peter @ cooksbayfishingboard.com.  I've never rented a boat from him but I have used his ice huts and thoroughly enjoyed it.  Good guy.

No problem allways like to help out a good ofner , like governator said Peter is a great guy and if anyone knows more about fishing in cooks bay , I havent seen them . Hope things work out and you have a great day on the water , B
